200.description: Get Account Statistic Data / Get Account Statistic Data / Get Account Statistic Data

desc.example: Concurrency: If your application experiences concurrent updates, the fetched oldValue might not be entirely accurate if another update occurs between the select and update queries.

text.example: When working with Drizzle ORM and needing to retrieve the old value of a column during an update operation, you'll generally need to employ a strategy that involves fetching the record's current state before applying the update.
